original_title: 新方世玉前传侠者无畏
overview: The young Fong Sai0yuk went to Hangzhou City with his father Fong De to buy goods from Guangdong. After arriving in Hangzhou, Fong Sai-yuk fought with the thunder tiger in the bazaar because he did not succumb to the overlord Thunder Tiger in the city. Fong sai-yuk  and Qiu Ming, who was rescued by the artist she was rescued, were chased and killed by Mrs. Li Xiaohuan from Lei. Later, through a remote tavern, she wanted to return to Hangzhou to retrieve Qiufu ’s body. Cut off the poison and poisoned the people, Fong Sai-yuk and Qiu Ming, and the second brother Fong Meiyu who had run away from home to Hangzhou, and the father and daughter of the remote pub Jin's father and daughter jointly exposed the Leifu conspiracy.
title: The New Fong Sai-yuk: The Beginning
